item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, February 19, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. 1972 Unix V2 "Beta" Resurrected (94 points | 11 comments)
2. When imperfect systems are good: Bluesky's lossy timelines (356 points | 148 comments)
3. Malaysia is betting on data centers to boost its economy (27 points | 7 comments)
4. Show HN: Mastra – Open-source JS agent framework, by the developers of Gatsby (270 points | 93 comments)
5. Show HN: Subtrace – Wireshark for Docker Containers (160 points | 34 comments)
6. Accelerating scientific breakthroughs with an AI co-scientist (234 points | 111 comments)
7. Broken legs and ankles heal better if you walk on them within weeks (267 points | 183 comments)
8. Egg Prices Are Soaring. Are Backyard Chickens the Answer? (15 points | 11 comments)
9. Relaxed Radix Balanced Trees (2024) (123 points | 10 comments)

11. A secret poker game you can play on the subway (158 points | 65 comments)
12. The 8-Bit Era's Weird Uncle: The TI-99/4A (6 points | discuss)
13. What should I expect from moving tech jobs from USA to Europe? (22 points | 16 comments)
14. Bloodflowtrixi.jl – 1D and 2D blood flow models for arterial circulation (25 points | 2 comments)
15. Apple Debuts iPhone 16e (315 points | 512 comments)

18. Unsloth AI (YC S24) is hiring ML engineers ( | hide)
19. Microsoft unveils Majorana 1 quantum processor (296 points | 121 comments)
20. Apple’s closed-source approach is losing out to AI app builders (65 points | 45 comments)
21. Show HN: MOS6502 in pure Lua running in WebAssembly (9 points | 1 comment)
22. An inside look at NSA tactics, techniques and procedures from China's lens (149 points | 40 comments)
23. I built a large language model "from scratch" (33 points | discuss)
24. Minuteman III test showcases readiness of U.S. nuclear force's deterrent (28 points | 65 comments)
25. Thoughts on Daylight Computer (263 points | 126 comments)
26. One Head, Two Brains (2015) (19 points | 10 comments)
27. 1977 Jazz-Funk Musical Adaptation of Dune (78 points | 25 comments)
28. Typst 0.13 is out now (201 points | 41 comments)
29. An early social un-network (73 points | 16 comments)
